subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Michael Matthews sprinted to victory in the third stage to remain in the overall lead, crossing the line half a length ahead of Fabio Felline of Italy and Philippe Gilbert of Belgium.
snippet: Michael Matthews sprinted to victory in the third stage to remain in the overall lead, crossing the line half a length ahead of Fabio Felline of Italy and Philippe Gilbert of Belgium.
